features: 357cc OHV Engine with IntelliPower™ is fuel injected so it reduces the number of starting steps, starts easy in extreme temperatures and altitudes, and eliminates fuel related starting issues
IntelliPower™ technology provides up to 20% more usable power, which means less bogging down in heavy, wet snow conditions for efficient snow removal and consistent blowing distance up to 40 feet
30 inch clearing width and 23 inch intake height.

specs.Headlight(s): Dual LED and LED Light Bar
